bike.description: Specialized FSR technology optimized for BRAIN shock, M5-XX Alloy w/ ORE technology, fully butted and manipulated, full sealed cartridge bearing pivots, disc compatible, 90mm travel, replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: Specialized BRAIN shock, manufactured by Fox Racing Shox, air spring and rebound adj., 11.7" eye to eye, 1.875" stroke
Rock Shox SID World Cup, 80mm travel, Dual Air, external rebound adj., "Climb-It" compression lock-out, Carbon crown and steerer
1 1/8" Threadless, 3x sealed, black alloy cups, cartridge bearings, ultralight carbon top cap w/alloy bolt
Thomson, CNC 7000 Series Aluminum, 5 degree rise
Specialized Carbon Fiber XC Low Rise bar, 6 degree upsweep, 8 degree backsweep, 640mm width
Specialized MTB grip, black, double density Kraton
Shimano M-960 XTR rim brake, cartridge pads, lightweight compressionless housings
Shimano M-960 XTR rim brake, cartridge pads, lightweight compressionless housings
Shimano M-960 XTR
Shimano M-960 XTR, 34.9mm clamp, bottom pull
Shimano M-952 XTR, long cage, standard spring
Shimano M-960 XTR, STI integrated shifter/lever combination, 9 speed
Shimano M-960 XTR Ti, 11/34, Titanium top 4 cogs
Shimano HG73
Shimano M-960 XTR Hollowtech II arms
44Ax32Ax22A, 7075 Aluminum, 44 Anodized, 32/22 Nickel-Plated, 4-bolt, 146/102/64mm pattern
Shimano M-960 XTR, Octalink spline, combined w/ crank, 68mm shell width, 133.5mm spindle length
Mavic X517, 26", black, welded seam, machined sidewalls, eyelets
S-Works / DT Hugi 240, 28 hole, cartridge bearings, 9mm Skraxle
DT Hugi 240, 32 hole, cartridge bearings
DT Swiss Revolution 1.8/1.5/1.8mm butted, stainless steel, black, alloy nipples, 254/254mm front, 263/265mm rear
Specialized S-Works Roll-X 2.0, aramid bead, 127 tpi, S-Works compound
Specialized S-Works Roll-X 2.0, aramid bead, 127 tpi, S-Works compound
Specialized Ultralight, presta valve
Specialized S-Works, Body Geometry technology, leather cover, abrasion resistant corner panels, Titanium rails
Thomson, 7000 Series Aluminum, 2-bolt adjust, set back head, 30.9mm x 367/410mm
Alloy collar with Q/R, 34.9mm clamp I.D., black
Chain stay/seat stay protector, derailleur protector, seatpost water bottle mount, reflectors, owners manual
